properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Concierge on the Slug
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

section.name: Concierge on the Slug
section.p: Once unslung, JamVM 1.4.3 can be installed (ipkg install jamvm). JamVM works out-of-the-box and behaves like standard Java 1.4 (except that the command is /opt/bin/jamvm and that it is open source :-). We have also tested Blackdown.
